slides.text: The Gym Light Cage is an easy to assemble protective cage for performance lights in a sports environment.  The smooth, rounded structure has openings of less than 5 inches.   30" or 36" square end sections are connected by four 1-1/2" schedule 80 pipe sections and by 20 pre-terminated 1/8" aircraft cables.  The Gym Light Cage is available with a MEGABATTEN which provides data and power outlets for the light fixture.  The Gym Light Cage ships flat, saving hundreds of dollars in freight charges.

The Mega-Coupler® Grounder™ is the solution for preventing truss and pipe from becoming accidentally charged by malfunctioning electrical attachments.  ETL listed as a UL476 grounding clamp in both the US and Canada, The Mega-Coupler® Grounder™ safely carried over 5,000 Amps to the system ground without failure.  The patent pending device accommodates both indoor and outdoor above ground installations.
